Summary: On back porch, dark, took pic of contrail and this object showed up when I downloaded pic
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking pictures from my back porch about 8 p.m. It was dark as it was late Oct. - Beginning of Nov. I took several pics. The 2 I am sending you are the only ones that have something on them that I would like your opinion on. The first pic was taken because I saw a contrail coming toward the house. I thought it was odd to see one when it was dark and I was trying to get a pic of what was making it. When I looked at the pic on my computer this other image showed up. It's odd, and I didn't see it when I took the picture. The second pic was also taken off my back porch when it was dark out. I had been getting some bad reception from my satelite on the roof and went out to see if something (planes) was causing it. I decided to take some pictures of the night sky, as I am always trying to get a pic of a UFO. I really don't know what these two images are, but maybe you can explain them to me. Also, during the early summer 2009 (April - May) off of the same back deck one morning, I looked out and saw a black triangular shape object moving just behind the top of the tree line the next street over. I didn't have my glasses on and ran to get them, but by the time I got back it was too far away for me to make out. Thanks for your time. I will wait to hear what you think the images are. Oh, and you will have to enlarge them somewhat in order to see the images.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around November 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
